fr.upmc.components.reflection.interfaces

Interface IntrospectionI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentServiceI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReflectionI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntrospectionConnector, IntrospectionInboundPort, IntrospectionOutboundPort, ReflectionConnector, ReflectionInboundPort, ReflectionOutboundPort

    public interface IntrospectionI
extends OfferedI, RequiredI
    The interface IntrospectionI defines the introspection services offered by the Basic Component Model.

    Description

    The Basic Component Model reflection facility is still under construction. The interface IntrospectionI mirrors to a large extent the interface ComponentI implemented by the abstract class AbstractComponent and exposes the methods that allow to consult the internal representation of the component.

    Created on : 2016-02-25

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
